title: Investigating the effectiveness of a new indoor ventilation model in reducing the spread of disease: A case of sports centres amid the COVID-19 pandemic
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): J.M. Ballesteros Álvarez, A. Romero Barriuso, B.M. Villena Escribano, A. Rodríguez Sáiz, C. González-Gaya
